page.title: 03FAMILY ENTERTAINMENT
page.content:
Some of the{entertainment}we have at home is{television.}If we are bored we play a game like snakes and ladders. And there is the{radio.}When it is a nice day we go to the{seaside}for the day. When it is raining we play on the {computer}or make up a game. Or make something like a{model}of a{monster}or something like that. When we have finished we papier mache it. Another {entertainment}is a{book.}A{book}has a lot of{pages}in it with{writing}on and normally tells a{story}. After school my{sister}and I play{hide}and{seek}in the back garden . Or we play with my {frizbee.}When it is windy I play with my{kite.}The tail is 10 feet long and it{rustles}in the wind.
{Alistair Flockhart {
